data.name: Grookey
data.flavorText: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

data.name: Scorbunny
data.flavorText: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Sobble
data.flavorText: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.

attacks.name: Bind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Rillaboom

abilities.name: Voltage Beat
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Frosmoth

abilities.name: Ice Dance
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Water Pokémon.

data.flavorText: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

abilities.name: Steely Spirit
abilities.text: Your Metal Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Gossifleur
data.flavorText: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Cinccino

attacks.name: Energy Assist

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Tar Generator

data.flavorText: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. During this turn, your Fire Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Archeops
data.flavorText: It needs a running start to take off. If Archeops wants to fly, it first needs to run nearly 25 mph, building speed over a course of about 2.5 miles.

abilities.name: Primal Turbo
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Special Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Hisuian Basculin
data.flavorText: Though it differs from other Basculin in several respects, including demeanor - this one is gentle - I have categorized it as a regional form given the vast array of shared qualities.

attacks.name: Submerge Silently
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if you go second, and only during your first turn. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

data.name: Cranidos
data.flavorText: Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It snapped trees by headbutting them, and then it fed on their ripe berries.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

data.name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Thunder Shock

data.name: Croagunk
